summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1569, for the improvement of West Fifty-first Street, in the City of Seattle, from Fifteenth Avenue Northwest to Seventeenth Avenue Northwest, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, lampholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16792 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
